resources.string: SD card is out of space, the recording has been saved.
Application is not installed on your phone.
Please insert SIM to launch SIM Toolkit.
Unable to launch SIM Toolkit since airplane mode is on.
SIM Toolkit is not ready or unsupported
Video call cannot be setup.Video telephone is unsupported on the phone you calling, dial with voice call?
Video call cannot be setup.The phone you have dialed is out of 3G service area, dial with voice call?
Video call cannot be setup. Dial with voice call?
Your phone is out of 3G service area, dial with voice call?
Video call cannot be setup.Video telephone service is not activated on this SIM card, dial with voice call?
3G service is off now, would you like to turn it on?
The %1$s SIM is unavailable. Would you like to place the call via %2$s
Available to switch cameras if turn on
Turn on to make peer video bigger than local video
Display local video when make a video call
Display local video when accept an incoming video call
"SD card is running out of space"
Network unreachable.The video call will disconnect.
Video cannot be displayed properly.The video call will disconnect.
Display picture for replacing peer video when it is unavailable
Set a picture to display when peer video unavailable
Drop back to voice call connecting automatically
The current camera cannot support this setting
SD card is out of space, the recording has been saved.
This is a new SIM card inserted
Video call cannot be answered since there is already a voice call
Voice call cannot be answered since there is already a video call
Since the camera is not available, video call cannot be connected. Please check if any other application is using the camera.
Video cannot be displayed properly.The video call is disconnected
Accept this call will end up the current call.
Accept this call will end up the outgoing call.
Accept this call will reject the other incoming call.
Accept this call will end up the voice call(s).
Accept this call will end up the outgoing call and reject the other incoming call.
Accept this call will end up the current call and reject the other incoming call.
"End current call, because it can't be hold."
Ring only once when choosing to accept a video call by voice call mode
Name and number can not be empty at the same time.
Phone book is busy now,please try later.
Turn on minute reminder at 50s of every minute
Internet call is disabled, would you like to enable it?
Please enter IP prefix number first in voice call settings.
IP dial function is not applicable to internet call.
Enter prefix number for IP dial
Phone number and call waiting settings
Are you sure you want to set 3G service to this SIM? This will also set the default SIM for Video call to this SIM automatically.
Switching SIM will take around 10 seconds to complete. Please wait...
Are you sure you want to turn off 3G service? This will also turn off Video call service automatically.
Voice call auto reject mode: All numbers
You have new voicemail from %s. Do you want to get them now?
Video call auto reject mode: All numbers
Manage voice call auto reject list
Manage video call auto reject list
International outgoing calls except to home PLMN
Type a password that is 4 numbers.
The password you entered do not match. Please try again.
The length of Channel name is not correct(1-10characters).
Please select at least one language.
Failed,the length of contact number is too long.
Failed,the length of contact name is too long.
Failed,Phone book is not ready now,please try later.
Network or SIM card is busy,please try later.
Language and channel setting for cell broadcast
Set a picture to display when camera off use
Set to block all voice incoming calls directly
Set to block all video incoming calls directly
Set to block all Internet incoming calls directly
Incoming call barred in the other side
Switch on data service? You may incur charges on data traffic!
Switch off data service? Other services will get impacted, e.g. sending and receiving MMS or E-mail.
Allow mobile data transmission at full speed

"Mobile data service preferred is used to improve the data transmission efficiency at the cost of lower call receiving rate. Not recommended to do so.
Are you sure to allow mobile data service preferred?"

The mobile phone will not select other operators for you in manual selection mode. Sometimes you have to do manual selection again or change back to automatic selection mode when you lost the service of the selected operator. We recommend that you use the \"Select automatically\". Do you want to select network manually?
"Currentlly, there's no service from the selected operator for the \"%s\" SIM card. We recommend that you use the \"Select automatically\", or you can manually select another operator."
"Currentlly, there's no service from the selected operator. We recommend that you use the \"Select automatically\", or you can manually select another operator."
Please also enable Data Roaming under Settings -> Wireless Networks -> Mobile Networks -> Data Roaming
"It's detected that you're making an international call. Please choose your destination."
"It's detected that you're dialing a %s number. Do you want to add the country code (+%s)?"
"It's detected that you are dialing a number in %1$s, %2$s. Do you want to add the country code and the area code (+%3$s)?"
"It's detected that you're dialing from the %s. Change international call prefix to '+'?"
"It's detected that you're dialing a number in %s. If so, please enter the area code."
"It's detected that you're dialing a number in %s. If your destination city is not %s, please enter the area code."
The area code of your destination city is needed for the call.
If your destination city is not %s, please input the area code of your destination city below.
Click the button below to change the country code number.
The number is invalid. Do you want to continue dialing anyway?
Do you want to add the country code and the area code?
You must enable data roaming for this SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this SIM?

3G service is not available with this selected SIM. This may load data slower. You can change the 3G service setting under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to select this SIM?

You must enable data roaming for this SIM first which may incur significant roaming charges! Besides, 3G service is not available with this SIM. This may load data slower. You can change it under Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks. Are you sure to enable data roaming and select this SIM?
Searching for all available networks will disconnect the data connection which is in use. Do you want to continue?
You can say \"%s\" or \"%s\" to answer or ignore an incoming call
Voice control is enabled for Phone
Are you sure you want to clear the data usage amount?
Entering incorrect PUK2 code more than 10 times,SIM card has been permanently locked
No SIM or SIM error in slot %d
No available networks. Please try to switch 3G service, or click a forbidden network to register manually.
"%1$s (%2$d٪) of %3$s period maximum Next period starts in %4$d days (%5$s)"
"%1$d٪ of cycle elapsed Next period starts in %2$d days (%3$s)"
Az FDN korlátozza a kimenő hívásokat.
Nem kezdeményezhet hívásokat, amíg a hívásletiltás be van kapcsolva.
A normál hívásokat korlátozza a hozzáférésvezérlés.
Írja be az új SIM PIN kódot újra a megerősítéshez
A SIM-kártya feloldva. A telefon kinyitása…
A kimenő hívások során elrejtett szám
A kimenő hívások során megjelenített szám
Alapértelmezett szolgáltatói beállítások használata a számom megjelenítésére a kimenő hívások során
Hívás közben értesítést kérek a beérkező hívásokról
Hívás közben értesítést kérek a beérkező hívásokról
Szolgáltatója nem támogatja a hívásátirányítás letiltását a telefon foglaltsága esetén.
Szolgáltatója nem támogatja a hívásátirányítás letiltását, ha a telefon nem fogadja a hívást.
Szolgáltatója nem támogatja a hívásátirányítás letiltását, ha a telefon ki van kapcsolva.
"Your Phone app's Fixed Dialing Numbers setting is turned on. As a result, some call-related features aren't working."
Operations are only allowed on fixed dialing numbers.
Turn on the radio before viewing these settings.
"Nem sikerült módosítani a postafiók számát. Ha a probléma nem szűnik meg, lépjen kapcsolatba mobilszolgáltatójával."
"Nem sikerült módosítani a hívásátirányítást. Ha a probléma nem szűnik meg, lépjen kapcsolatba mobilszolgáltatójával."
"Nem sikerült lekérni és elmenteni a jelenlegi hívásátirányítási beállításokat. Mégis átvált az új szolgáltatóra?"
Hiba történt a hálózatok keresése közben.
SIM-kártyája nem teszi lehetővé a kapcsolódást ehhez a hálózathoz.
Jelenleg nem lehet csatlakozni ehhez a hálózathoz. Kérjük, próbálja újra később.
Enable data access over Mobile network
Connect to data services when roaming
Connect to data services when roaming
"You've lost data connectivity because you left your home network with data roaming turned off."
Allow data roaming? You may incur significant roaming charges!
"%1$s maximum exceeded Data rate reduced to %2$d Kb/s"
Data rate reduced to %1$d Kb/s if data use limit is exceeded
"More information about your carrier's mobile network data use policy"
"FDN wasn't updated because the number can't exceed 20 digits."
"FDN wasn't updated. The PIN2 was incorrect, or the phone number was rejected."
No contacts on your SIM card.
To import contacts from the SIM card, first turn off Airplane mode.
"The old PIN you typed isn't correct. Try again."
"The PINs you typed don't match. Try again."
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers.
The PIN you typed was incorrect.
Password incorrect, SIM is locked! PUK2 requested.
A megadott PUK2-kód helytelen. Kérjük, próbálja újra.
A megadott régi PIN2-kód helytelen. Kérjük, próbálja újra.
A beírt PIN2-kódok nem egyeznek. Kérjük, próbálja újra.
A jelszó helytelen; kérjük, módosítsa a PIN2-kódot és próbálja újra.
A jelszó helytelen, a SIM-kártya zárolva lett. Adja meg a PUK2-kódot.
To place a call, first turn off Airplane mode.
Call not sent, no valid number entered.
Nem lehet váltani a hívások között.
A hívás nem indítható; a(z) %s nem segélyhívó szám!
A hívás nem indítható, kérjük, tárcsázzon egy segélyhívó számot!
Set the length of DTMF tones

"A special call needs to be made to activate your phone service.
After pressing “Activate”, listen to the instructions provided to activate your phone."

"If you skip activation, you can't place calls or connect to mobile data networks (though you can connect to Wi-Fi networks). Until you activate your phone, you are asked to activate it each time you turn it on."
Follow the spoken instructions until you hear that activation is complete.
Please wait while your phone is being programmed.
Your phone is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.

"Your phone did not activate. You may need to find an area with better coverage (near a window, or outside).
Try again or call customer service for more options."
"A választott művelet nem érhető el segélyhívás során"
For all calls when data network is available
Always use to place Internet calls
You can change which Internet calling account to use by default from the Phone > Settings > Internet call settings > Accounts screen.
There are no Internet calling accounts on this phone. Add one now?
Account registration stopped because there is no Internet connection.
Account registration stopped because there is no Wi-Fi connection.
Account registration unsuccessful: (%s); will try later
Account registration unsuccessful: Incorrect username or password.
Account registration unsuccessful: Check the server name.
This account is currently in use by the %s app.
"%s is required and can't be left blank."
Port number should be within 1000 and 65534.
To place an Internet call, check your Internet connection first.
You need to be connected to a Wi-Fi network for Internet calls (use the Wireless & Network settings).
Vibrate when a call is answered
Vibrate every 45 seconds during outgoing calls
Vibrate when a call has ended
Screen will stay awake longer than normal while in-call
Connect to data services when roaming
Show SIM suggestion based on SIM usage
Application with this permission can, at any time, change between 2G Data and 3G data. 3G is faster, consumes more batery, and can also cost you more money.
Can not add the number as it is alreay in the list.
The number was added to blacklist successfully.
The number was not added to blacklist. Please make sure you enter the correct number and try again.
The number was added to whitelist successfully.
The number was not added to whitelist. Please make sure you enter the correct number and try again.
The number was deleted from blacklist successfully.
The number was not deleted from blacklist.
The number was deleted from whitelist successfully.
The number was not deleted from whitelist.
